sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都有"夜，晚上"之意。
means: evening ： 指日落到就寝之间的时间。
night ： 指从日落到日出或从黄昏到拂晓这段时间。

sentence.Network_en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentence.Network_en: It was just gone 7 o'clock this evening when I finished.
sentence.Network_cn: 今晚我做完的时候刚过7点。

sentence.Network_en: The evening show was terrible, with hesitant unsure performances from all.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚上的演出很糟，所有人都缩手缩脚，显得很不自信。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ǣfnung 'dusk falling, the time around sunset', from ǣfnian 'approach evening', from ǣfen (see even)

entry.def: The evening is the part of each day between the end of the afternoon and the time when you go to bed.

example.ex: All he did that evening was sit around the flat...
example.tran: 那天晚上他一直在公寓里无所事事地坐着。

example.ex: Supper is from 5.00 to 6.00 in the evening...
example.tran: 晚餐在傍晚5点到6点之间。

means.word_mean: 1. the latter part of the day (the period of decreasing daylight from late afternoon until nightfall);

sentences.sentence: "he enjoyed the evening light across the lake"
"it was the evening of the Roman Empire"

means.word_mean: 3. the early part of night (from dinner until bedtime) spent in a special way;

auth_sentence.content: Large rallies in cities were set for the evening.
auth_sentence.res_content: Large rallies in cities were set for the evening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Large rallies in cities were set for the evening.

auth_sentence.content: The protests had been planned since the previous evening.
auth_sentence.res_content: The protests had been planned since the previous evening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The protests had been planned since the previous evening.

auth_sentence.content: He has a re-election event in Washington Monday evening.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has a re-election event in Washington Monday evening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has a re-election event in Washington Monday evening.

Sentence.sentence: Well, at 3:30, you're seeing our sales representative there and then you're free till the evening.
What does the woman say about her evening class
I have to do an interview for the evening news about a man with dozens of cats.

M : sorry to have kept you waiting ,Madam , I've located your luggage, it was left behind in Paris and won't arrive until later this evening W : oh ,I can't believe this ,have it been to delivered to my hotel then ,I guess Q :what happened to the woman's luggage
And the Swedes makes most of it often they started work earlier in summer and then leave at about 2 or 3 in the afternoon, so that they can really enjoy the long summer evenings.

means.word_mean: 傍晚, 黄昏, 晚上

sentences.en: Evening in the country is a very peaceful time.
sentences.cn: 乡村里的傍晚是平静安谧的时刻。

sentences.en: On summer evenings we often have supper in the garden.
sentences.cn: 夏季的晚上, 我们常常在花园里吃饭。

means.word_mean: 晚会, 晚上娱乐活动

sentences.en: We held an English evening last week.
sentences.cn: 上周我们举行了一次英语晚会。

jushi.english: Velma burnt herself to death on the evening of September 8,1982.
jushi.chinese: 威尔玛1982年9月8日傍晚自焚身亡。

jushi.english: We had an animated discussion over current events last evening.
jushi.chinese: 昨天晚上我们热烈地讨论时事。

jushi.english: Come around this evening if you have time.
jushi.chinese: 今晚有空到我这里来一下。
